column4: anyone know what i can do aobut my keyboard not loading, grub also fails to load 2 modules via the modprobe command with failed permissions
which keyboard have you got that it does not load?
i havn't done anything with the OS yet its a base install
so what keyboard is it you are having issues with?
logitech inavigator
I can't get a picture of that one - is it wireless and the docking bit is usb?
its a usb keyboard plugged into my onboard usb port
by any chance do you have a PS2 converter and port?
perhaps
i belive i do let me look
I would suggest that might just be what you need
it would take hours to find it....
my usb mouse is detected fine, but not my keyboard
from what I know it is pretty hit and miss with usb k/b and mouse issues
it would most likely be well worth your while to actually look for that little bit of kit
perhaps changing aorund the usb keyboard/mouse would work?
not sure if i pitched it or not
it might
are the usb devices detected at startup or during installation
it needs to be detected at startup so you can do the installation
my thing is though, does the installation look for usb devices at system startup, or put them into a config file during operating system installation
startup popluates /proc/usb with them so that they can be used as the day goes on
so if i switch the usb devices around i won't have to reinstall the OS
I do not know the answer to that try it and see
